评论概述: Loved at first, ripped after first use!
类型: Color: Bra and Leggings: ChocolateSize: Small
评论详情: I was so glad I found this set and I loved the color which although I purchased the brown in person its more of a wine/bordeaux mix. I'm 5'8", 153lbs for reference and bought a small. I always try on these sets carefully beforehand and it fit great, with good compression, stretch and comfort. The bra top for sure is only meant to be worn as loungewear or for light/slow movement such as yoga, pilates or strength training. I am a 34D and had to remove the padding as it shifted and made awkward buldges. For larger chested ladies, I don't see if the girls would be supported. I was in a strength training session focusing on legs when I realized the crotch had ripped. I was so embarrassed and rushed to the restroom to put on a long shirt that, (luckily, I had in my gymbag) that covered my backside to finish my sets. Had I bought a larger size, it would have been loose in the waistline of the leggings as well as the ribcage of the bra. I will try to sew and repair myself since it tore in the seam, but I was so bummed it happened on my first wear. I will update my review if I was able to fix it myself.
